alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 9:58PM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze along with a trace of sleet and snow. * WHERE...Clark County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest impacts from this wintry mix will likely fall in a narrow band, which may still shift north or south of the advisory area. Please stay up to date on the forecast this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
